extendedInfo.description: Use your phone as a microphone by plugging it into speakers! Does not work well if using internal phone speakers.Feedback can be a problem. Keep the microphone away from the speaker as much as possible and adjust the volume attenuation and microphone sensitivity sliders. The audio is delayed. It's annoying. It's a problem with Android.

reviews.title: Fantastic Tool
reviews.comment: This is one of the best Mobile Mics available in the market, with the flexibility of configuring microphone sensitivity as well as volume attenuation; just wish that the developers would make it usable even with the screen shut/locked.
reviews.author: manish dugar

reviews.title: Ignore
reviews.comment: All negative responses because it says not to use internal speakers... morons
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Microphone?
reviews.comment: Lol! My voice is even louder than the sound coming out from the external speakers on maximum volume. It is suppose to make your voice louder. Isn\'t it? Defeats the purpose. Make it loud and you\'ll deserve 5.
reviews.author: Voltz M

reviews.comment: Very good concept, but the UI could be much better. The day when latency issue can be addressed, would be quite useful. Keep it coming, developer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never want to see this appear again!!!
reviews.comment: This app SUCKS!!! I mean not to be rude or anything but I AM TELLING THE TRUTH!!!! I could hear the sound of the little chihuahua from the the naborhood next to me........I COULD HEAR THE SOUND OF THAT DOG MORE LOUD AND CLEAR THAN I HEAR THIS CRAPPY APP!!!! And that\'s only my opinion. If I rated this app I would give it a 1!!! But anyway have fun with this crappy app!!!!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seriously
reviews.comment: This just makes noise after im done talking

reviews.comment: This doesn\'t even work so don\'t use it just ignore it

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Do not eliminate the delay.  I use it to teach my daughter her sounds.  Once you fix the delay,  keep it as an configurable feature.

reviews.title: Fun toy
reviews.comment: Its a toy and I\'ve had fun playing with it. I would like to choose the input and output devices so I can use it to test bluetooth range or throw my voice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works awesome
reviews.comment: Noise reduction is kind of not working. But the app woks great. It\'s your job to keep the phone away from the speakers to avoid feedback.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t expect a lot but it is fun for about 5 min. You get 2 stars from me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing.
reviews.comment: Can\'t hear me. Delay is bad. Plus it kept closing on me. Wanted this to work so bad. Uninstalled. Bummer
reviews.author: Jess Himple

reviews.comment: Sux (I would do 0 stars but I can\'t)

reviews.comment: This is not that good....it makes a lot of noise and only stops when you talk into the mike.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great for secretly listening to your surroundings. The voice filter cuts background noise to really sneak into surrounding conversation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is so cool and u can plug it into a piano or a sterio.i always bug my mom
